infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: We use your location to show your position on the map and let you save mushroom spots nearby.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: We use the camera so you can take a mushroom photo for identification.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: We access your photo library to pick images for identification.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: We may save images to your photo library when you export or save media.
